function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Adverse psychological outcomes associated with home confinement and social distancing during the pandemic, including emotional disorders, depression, anxiety, stress, irritability, insomnia, ptsd, anger, emotional exhaustion, risky behaviors, and increased substance abuse.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Neglecting local community adaptations in epidemic contexts","category":"Community Participation","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traveling and non-necessary social contacts advised against by health directive.","category":"Access to infrastructure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assumption of homogeneous mixing of people within each region","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Disregard for the risk to vulnerable populations when not following guidelines","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misleading content","category":"Misinformation and Media Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in responses to pandemic based on theoretical constructs","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Community participation in control policies and preventative measures","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Link between park use patterns and park access/proximity","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased social media use due to covid-19 related news and anxiety.","category":"Communication and Messaging","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven population distribution in the building","category":"Access to infrastructure","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate public compliance with policy measures","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social support to control the epidemic","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper daylight in work/study areas may lead to increased drowsiness and reduced productivity, impacting overall well-being.","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of citizen participation in pandemic response","category":"Community Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Professional focus on holistic approach to building health","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of misinformation in social web discussions about articles","category":"Misinformation and Media Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stress and mental fatigue","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close social interactions in the living rooms and open spaces increase the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited representation of comfort criteria in leed standards","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Promotion of telecommuting leading to increased health and organizational capacity","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Eviction","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration with local communities may lead to increased risk of contagious disease propagation","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate understanding of latent customer needs","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"The high level of uncertainty and unreliability in the availability of unskilled work within the communities","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long-term collaboration and stakeholder engagement required for successful disease mitigation initiatives.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Stigmatism and distrust in health services resulting in efforts to hide cases of contagious diseases ebola, sars, influenza, tuberculosis .","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"People gathering on balconies increases the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Changes in physical activity behavior compared to pre-pandemic levels","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceptions of covid-19 as a travel-associated risk leading to a planned shift in typical travel behaviors.","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overcrowding and lack of physical distancing","category":"Access to infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studies related to the pandemic may have limitations due to the sars-cov-2 outbreak, impacting the randomization of the sample.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cultural differences in work environment expectations","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of focus on promoting mental health and well-being.","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transition from physical workspace to virtual and agile workspace.","category":"Occupational and Employment Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation related to covid-19 on social media","category":"Misinformation and Media Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of misinformation or false data through unverified social media channels and personal contacts.","category":"Misinformation and Media Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded living conditions leading to the spread of communicable diseases","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Distress, frustration, and loneliness due to confinement and loss of social/physical contact","category":"Mental and Emotional Wellbeing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spreading inaccurate news","category":"Misinformation and Media Risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Crowded housing leading to lack of privacy and inadequate sanitation facilities","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to nutritious foods for vulnerable populations","category":"Health Behaviors and Compliance","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Housing precarity and poor neighborhood quality amplifying health risks","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Acceptability of social distancing as a temporary measure","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcrowded living conditions leading to increased risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Physical activity and mobility","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disruption of education, child development","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Access to infrastructure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower-income population residing in low-rent areas","category":"Vulnerability risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heightened social tensions and security risks in informal settlements, including criminal activity and strained socioeconomic conditions.","category":"Social Justice Concerns","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Epidemics and pandemics leading to public response and increased stress levels","category":"Social and Psychological Effects ","confidence":"High"}]}
